name: Multiplayer parkour FPS (Alpha 0.2)
description:
Parkour fps pvp game in development

Controls:

WASD to move

SHIFT to run (Tap to push yourself)

SPACE to jump (You can double jump)

C to crouch (You can slide if you are running fast enough)

V to change view

Left Click to shoot other players

Wallrun all you can, grab the slow down power, try to reach every plataform in cool ways, up kill your friends, and most importantly have fun!

V. 0.2

Animations sync(with a couple bugs)

All bugs reported to my mail fixed

Small not completly functional menu implemented (Doesn't quite work while on the room, it should be by pressing ESC)

Please contact me if you find out any bug or have any good idea for the game (even the name), you will be credited :)

enriqueag26@gmail.com

Next stepts:

More gamemodes

Coop stealth story
